summary: The definitive film about Creation Records, one of the world's most successful and colorful independent labels.
cast: Alan McGee|Bobby Gillespie|Noel Gallagher|Chris Abbot|Tim Abbot|Paul Arthurs|Norman Blake|Clint Boon|Guy Chadwick|Joe Foster|Mark Gardener|Neil Hannon|Kate Holmes|Peter Hook|Johnny Hopkins|Tony McCarroll|Bob Mould|Oasis|Jim Reid|Gruff Rhys|Andy Ross|Kle Savidge|Kevin Shields|Mike Smith|Stephen Street|Irvine Welsh|Alan White|Tony Wilson|Brian Cannon|Liam Gallagher|Paul McGuigan|John Squire
title: Upside Down: The Creation Records Story
